keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations

byline.original: By ALISSA J. RUBIN and AURELIEN BREEDEN

lead_paragraph: In some recent cases, women have been at the heart of attack plots, highlighting a possible evolution in the dynamics of gender for some of the Islamic State’s European recruits.

headline.print_headline: Female French Jihadists Signal Shift in ISIS Roles
headline.main: Women’s Emergence as Terrorists in France Points to Shift in ISIS Gender Roles

snippet: In some recent cases, women have been at the heart of attack plots, highlighting a possible evolution in the dynamics of gender for some of the Islamic State’s European recruits....
abstract: Series of attempted terrorist attacks in and around Paris that have been perpetrated by female French jihadists signals possible shift in strategy by Islamic State, which may be using radicalized women more in plotting and carrying out attacks.
